name: Crankbrothers Highline 3 Dropper Seat Post 170mm
description: This quality dropper seat post delivers snappy performance on the trail.7075-T6 alloy with Trelleborg® sealing, with 170mm of travel.Cable actuated with hydraulic cartridge.Jagwire® cable and housing, with internal routing.2-bolt head.Diameter: 30.9mm or 31.6mm.Remote sold separately.
